name: Trailing Delimiter
csl:
<style xmlns="http://purl.org/net/xbiblio/csl" class="in-text" xml:lang="en">
 <macro name="creator-key">
 <names variable="author">
 <name sort-separator=", " name-as-sort-order="all"/>
 </names>
 </macro>
 <citation>
 <option name="et-al-min" value="3"/>
 <option name="et-al-use-first" value="1"/>
 <option name="collapse" value="year-suffix"/>
 <option name="disambiguate-add-year-suffix" value="true"/>
 <option name="year-suffix-delimiter" value=", "/>
 <option name="after-collapse-delimiter" value="; "/>
 <sort>
 <key macro="creator-key"/>
 </sort>
 <layout delimiter=", " prefix="(" suffix=")">
 <group delimiter=" ">
 <names variable="author">
 <name form="short" and="symbol" delimiter=", "/>
 <et-al prefix=" "/>
 </names>
 <date variable="issued">
 <date-part name="year"/>
 </date>
 </group>
 <text variable="year-suffix"/>
 </layout>
 </citation>
</style>
